CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc East Ebony?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc East Ebony is arc {Jessestad}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc East Ebony?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc East Ebony is arc {Michaelchester}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {East Ebony} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Kellyville to Jessestad in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from East Ebony to Jessestad in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Michaelchester and Jessestad in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Michaelchester and Jessestad is {752}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between East Ebony and Michaelchester in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between East Ebony and Michaelchester is {754}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Kellyville?
SC.A: The total flow output from Kellyville is {902}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Michaelchester?
SC.A: The total flow input by Michaelchester is {2071}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 794? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {835} from {Michaelchester} to {East Ebony}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 438? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {408} from {East Ebony} to {Jessestad}, a flow of {337} from {Kellyville} to {Jessestad}, a flow of {252} from {Jessestad} to {Kellyville}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 500 and 549? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {533} from {Michaelchester} to {Kellyville}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Jessestad to Kellyville or from Jessestad to Michaelchester?
NC.A: The flow from {Jessestad} to {Michaelchester} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from East Ebony to Michaelchester, from Kellyville to Michaelchester, or from Jessestad to Kellyville?
NC.A: The flow from {East Ebony} to {Michaelchester} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Kellyville}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {East Ebony} and {Michaelchester}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Kellyville, Arc Michaelchester, Arc Jessestad, Arc East Ebony}.
